value:
$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|There you are, Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|This is as far as it goes. Please...
I'd like you to surrender.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|That isn't possible. Either you die,
or I do... Until that happens, this
battle cannot end.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Stop it! Please!$k$pWalk the path that your sister—your
Sharena—would want for you.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|I strayed from that path long ago.$k$pLet us begin.$k$p$EFace_Anger|I am Líf, general of the realm of
the dead. And today, I shall add a
notch to Sökkvabekkr...when you die.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06B,0|$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|This is it, then?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$EFace_Pain|I couldn't save you... I am sorry.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Why are you apologizing, Alfonse?
There is no need. You won.$k$pI was driven to madness, to ruin...$k$pBut you—you are still you.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Sharena, the citizens of Askr, even
$Nu...$k$pI couldn't save a single one of them.
The grief twisted me.$k$pBut they all yet live in your world.
Perhaps I can draw some small
comfort from that...$k$pPlease, Alfonse... Ensure a happier
future for your Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$pYou are me. Had things turned out
just a little bit differently, our fortunes
could have been reversed...$k$pThe least I can do is to work to make
Askr such a place. You have my word.$k$p$EFace_Cool|But first...I must eradicate the source
of all this suffering.$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|This...is the weapon that Líf held.
The weapon we're looking for.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Wait a second—that's Breidablik,
isn't it? It's like the one held by
$Nu!$k$pThat must mean that the Alfonse
of this world entrusted that weighty
power to $Nu...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes. And as we suspected, the
summoner from this realm perished
along with everyone else...$k$pThat's why Alfonse was carrying
it. As a keepsake. He couldn't
let go...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Well, $Nu...$k$pYou should be able to wield this
one too.$k$p$EFace_Anger|It's time to return to the realm of
the dead. We must end this waking
nightmare Hel has fashioned.$k$pBy our hands. There can be no
mistake.$k$p$Sbs150|
